values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM_SWEEPS_2
values.value:
We still kneel to the weirwood trees, are judged by their pained faces, lay our sins before them as naked as babes. A day will come when the Seven are forsaken for another faith, but the Old Gods will watch us until our dying days.

Honor the Old Gods with EXTRA GOLD and bonus rewards for Shrine Prayers all week long! Also during the Honor the Old Gods:

*Look out for 24 hour runs of power-progressing events!
*Pray to the Shrine for bonus rewards all week long!

Using Gems to redeem bundles in the Store awards points towards this event.
If the purchases made with Gems contain Gold, that Gold will contribute to the progress of the separate Iron Bank's Prosperity events. Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase. Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_HOLIDAY_REBELLION_PVP_ST_1_UNLOCK
values.value:
The people cry out for bread and justice, and mobs assault their liege lords in the streets. Angry flames lick at the banners over the great castles of Westeros. Will new banners fly there tomorrow, once the fire has burned them all away?

Defeat other players to earn points! Earn additional points for defeating troops at Strategic Terrain!Earn points for gathering at Strategic Terrain, clearing nodes, and executing Battlefield Salvage Recipes!

King's Landing and all regional capitals will be unlocked during this event! Seats of Power will return to their normal unlock schedule the weekend after the event is over, so plan accordingly.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_9
values.value:
The fastest mode of travel in Westeros is by dragonback, a privilege few have experienced since before the fall of House Targaryen. That Daenerys would trust Jon to ride one of her dragons shows how much their relationship has grown. The fact that Rhaegal allows him him to approach without protest is perhaps even more meaningful. The dragons may recognize something that Jon has yet to understand himself...

Craft any Season VIII event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Married in Secret event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season VIII Gear Sets: Targaryen Royal, Valyrian Champion, Festival Carouser, Dragon Rider, Valyrian Bloodmage, Living Mountain, Northern Noble

Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_CRAFT_1
values.value:
"The fortunes of Duskendale have long since vanished under the increasing power of nearby King's Landing. Lord Darklyn, fearing for the future of his house, petitioned Tywin, Hand of the King, for a new charter for Duskendale to reverse it's decline, and he was refused. Offended by Tywin's decision, he retaliated by refusing to pay the King's taxes, and set into motion a most dangerous plot.                                
                                                                                         Craft any event gear to earn points! Kingsguard Leather materials for the Targaryen Kingsguard gear set are available in other Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale events. 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event"
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event"

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_CRAFT_2
values.value:
"Among the Kingsguard of King Aerys II, few held such distinctions as Ser Barristan Selmey, named 'the Bold' for his bravery as a mystery knight in the Tourney at Blackhaven. He was knighted in his 17th year after unhorsing Ser Duncan the Tall in a tourney at King's Landing. He slew Maelys the Monstrous in single combat during the War of the Ninepenny Kings. Still, his greatest achievement was yet to come...                                                                                         Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials for the Grappling Hook Trinket by defeating creatures in the Ser Barristan the Bold event. 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event"

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_PVE_1
values.value:
"Against the wishes of Tywin, King Aerys II made his way to Duskendale to broker an arrangement with Lord Darklyn. Yet Tywin's fears proved founded, for upon the arrival of the King's entourage, the knights of Duskendale and House Hollard fell upon them. Ser Gwayne Gaunt faught valiantly to protect his liege, but he was slain by Ser Symon Hollard, and the King was taken captive in the Dun Fort.                                                                                                                                    Defeat Darklyn Bannerman to earn points! 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event"

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_PVE_2
values.value:
"Tywin was eager to end the long siege of the Dun Fort and prepared to launch an assault—with or without a guarantee of the King's safety. Ser Barristan pled for one final chance to save his liege. Granted one day's time, he donned the guise of a beggar and scaled the casle walls in the dead of night...                                                                                                                               Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for the new Grappling Hook trinket, which can be crafted for points in the Ser Barristan the Bold event. 
Part of the the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event"

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_PVE_RALLY_1
values.value:
Once inside the Dun Fort, Ser Barristan stormed the dungeon, fighting his way through the men of House Darklyn and Hollard, eventually finding King Aerys II. Even Ser Symon Hollard could not stop Ser Barristan, who slew him, thus avenging Ser Gwayne. In the chaos, Ser Barristan sent King Aerys II ahead on a horse, staying behind to buy him time, before escaping himself, while suffering an arrow wound to his chest no less.                                                                  Defeat Darklyn Commander to earn points! 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event"

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_TRADE_1
values.value:
"King Aerys II, now a prisoner of House Darklyn,has been locked deep within the dungeons of the Dun Fort. Lord Darklyn  made the situation clear —if there was any sign of an attack on Duskendale, that he would kill the King. Tywin, left with no other recourse, is forced to settle into a long siege to starve out the defenders.                                                                            Braavosi Loan trophy recipes are available while this event is active. Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points! 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event"

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_TRADE_2
values.value:
Without the King as a hostage, the beleaguered forces of house Darklyn and Hollard had no choice but to surrender, and the Defiance of Duskendale ended . King Aerys II showed them no mercy—he brutally tortured and executed all of the surviving members of the traitorous houses. The sole survivor was a young Ser Dontos Hollard, and only then because Ser Barristan pleaded for the boy's life.                                                                                                                     Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points. This event's Recipes are your last chance to use Braavosi Loan trophies before they can only be exchanged for Trader's Scrip! 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event"

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_UMBRELLA_1
values.value:
"Among the many battles and tales to involve the Kingsguard, few are so fabled or fresh in memory as those that participated in what would become known as The Defiance of Duskendale. The duplicity of a fading noble house in the Crownlands had to contend with the stalwart bravery of knights who gave anything to protect their liege.                                                                                                                                                                       Look for these Featured Rewards throughout the Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale event:
* Kingsguard Leather are used to craft the Targaryen Kingsguard gear set!
* Grappling Hook Grappling Hook Chain are used to craft the Grappling Hook trinket!
* Braavosi Loan trophies can be traded for prizes in the Recipes tab of your Inventory while the Siege of the Dun Fort or Mad King's Ire events are active. Remember to use all your Braavosi Loan trophies before the Mad King's Ire event ends!"

values.value: Craft this trinket and rally your Infantry for glory!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_REGIONCONTROL_ENABLE_INTRO_1
values.value:
The whole of Westeros is made up of eight significant regions: The Seven Kingdoms of old and the Crownlands. Each has its Capital, represented by the 4 and 4.5 Star seats of power. Holding any of these is a great achievement for a ruler and an allegiance, and vital for making a claim to the Iron Throne itself.

Under Region Control rules, if your Allegiance wishes to march on a region's capital it must control enough seats of power within that region. This applies both to rallies and reinforcing! You can use this to your advantage to cut off an entrenched seat holder's lines of support, or to put down a would-be usurper by denying them the seats they need to contest your rule.

Each Capital lists its March Requirement, which might be a number of seats or total stars of seats in the same region. Each seat adds to your allegiance's region control total, excluding the Capital itself.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_RECIPE_MARCHSLOT
values.value: While this event is active, you can trade Writs to grant yourself an additional March Slot for 8-hours. The new recipe is available in the Item Exchange under Basic Recipes. Recipe events are temporary.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE
values.value: In the throes of battle, a legend is born! From across the realm, your rival Lords and Ladies assemble to battle on a level playing field, neutral ground. They are willing to risk their name for the promise of glory, or perhaps even infamy. For 24 hours, you too can seize this opportunity, to enter the crucible and claim a Seat of Power on these new lands! Defend it with all your might, and inscribe your name in the annals of history. When the dust settles, your valor will be measured by how long you were capable of holding onto a Seat of Power. But beware, the others vying for glory will not give up without a fight. Are you prepared to Test Your Mettle?

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE_1
values.value: In the throes of battle, a legend is born! From across the realm, your rival Lords and Ladies assemble to battle on a level playing field, neutral ground. They are willing to risk their name for the promise of glory, or perhaps even infamy. For 24 hours, you too can seize this opportunity, to enter the crucible and claim a Seat of Power on these new lands! Defend it with all your might, and inscribe your name in the annals of history. When the dust settles, your valor will be measured by how long you were capable of holding onto a Seat of Power. But beware, the others vying for glory will not give up without a fight. Are you prepared to Test Your Mettle?

values.name: CHAT_COMPLIANCE_ALERT

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TESTYOURMETTLE_PREEVENT
values.value: Coming Soon! Test Your Mettle Event

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TESTYOURMETTLE_STARTEVENT
values.value:
Lords from across multiple kingdoms compete against each other by taking and holding Seats of Power! This competition is bracketed by Lord level, providing a neutral kingdom where players of similar power can participate in the event to earn points and rewards. Players can only join the neutral kingdom that is appropriate for their level and they can return to their home kingdom at any point during the event. At the end of the event, lords will automatically return to their home kingdoms. 
Special buffs are provided to those traveling to the neutral kingdom, protecting their troops from dying and also providing combat bonuses for attacking and defending Seats of Power. In this event, the number of troops, type of gear, gear quality, and strategic timing will make all the difference.

Event Rules
-> Capture Seats of Power in the new kingdom to gain event points.
-> Seats will lock and unlock on a schedule.
-> At the end of the event, the top players will be rewarded the best rewards.

Good luck and thank you for playing Games of Thrones: Conquest
